description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
Kforce's client, one of the world's largest financial institutions is seeking 2 Machine Learning - Conversational AI Python Cloud Engineers in Wilmington, Delaware (Philadelphia area). Both roles are quick opportunities to be fulltime employees with the client.

Summary:
Efforts will be focused on development of conversational dialog and establishing flows to improve existing as well as enable new self-service capabilities in the IVR, implementing a common model for servicing with cross-lob intent understanding and scaling to retail and other lobs (ex. card).

REQUIREMENTS:
• 5 years of experience
• Strong Python Coding skills
• AWS/Cloud
• Experience working with NLP-Natural Language Processing models
• Must have experience with Conversational AI platforms (preferred RASA or Amazon's LEX) (i.e. Rasa, Amazon Lex, Google Dialogflow, Ada, Spoke, Oracle Icon-Digital Assistant, Chorus AI, Google DialogFlow, LivePerson, Acquire, Cognigy, Avaamo, MS Bot Framework, Aisera, Haptik, Feedyou, Heyday, Intercom, Amelia, Zendesk, LiveChat, Drift, TIDIO, Ecounter AI, SAP Conversational AI, Kore, IBM Watson Assistant, Clinc, ChatBots, Moveworks, Converscia, OpenAI, GMass, Alana, Engati, BoostAI, Spoke, Botsify, eBanqo, Replicant, Hello24AI, MobileMonkey, Replyco, Solvemate, Botosynthesis, Conversica, ZoomInfo Chat, iNextLabs, Reecall, Eloquant, Vizir, Watchatbot)
• Experience deploying and debugging machine learning models in production
• Experience with MLOPS - Machine Learning Operations takes code to production, deployment & debugging
• Bitbucket/GitHub

The pay range is the lowest to highest compensation we reasonably in good faith believe we would pay at posting for this role. We may ultimately pay more or less than this range. Employee pay is based on factors like relevant education, qualifications, certifications, experience, skills, seniority, location, performance, union contract and business needs. This range may be modified in the future.

We offer comprehensive benefits including medical/dental/vision insurance, HSA, FSA, 401(k), and life, disability & ADD insurance to eligible employees. Salaried personnel receive paid time off. Hourly employees are not eligible for paid time off unless required by law. Hourly employees on a Service Contract Act project are eligible for paid sick leave.

Note: Pay is not considered compensation until it is earned, vested and determinable. The amount and availability of any compensation remains in Kforce's sole discretion unless and until paid and may be modified in its discretion consistent with the law.

This job is not eligible for bonuses, incentives or commissions.

Kforce is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status.
